definition: to turn/to turn around/to transfer (funds etc)
to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Due to emergencies, we sailed in the opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 由於緊急情況，我們撥轉了船頭。

sentences.english: He wheeled his horse about and galloped across the field.
sentences.chinese: 他撥轉馬頭，策馬馳過田野。

sentences.english: They wheeled their horses around and left.
He turned his horse's head and galloped away.
sentences.chinese: 他撥轉馬頭飛也似地跑開了。

sentences.english: He turned his horse and rode away.
I know we ca ot back the clock and return.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，我們不能把時鐘撥轉，回到從前。
